name: Itemize
overview:
All Your Receipts In One Place. Easily track everything you buy. Stay organized and shop smarter.

Itemize is an electronic receipt aggregation and intelligence platform for the payments industry. The company’s solutions digitally gather and manage shopping receipts for consumers and small businesses. By capturing and categorizing item-level detail for every purchase, Itemize helps shoppers easily track everything they buy. The service also provides a suite of practical tools that help consumers stay organized and shop smarter. These include automated product registration services, warranty updates, tagging and reporting for personal expense management, and recommendations for future purchases.

Itemize provides consumers with a dedicated email account for their online shopping, with tools to gather and manage their receipts. For offline purchases, Itemize provides a smartphone app that captures the receipt image and uploads the itemized data to a secure server. Itemize uses patented machine learning techniques to automatically capture the line-item details in any receipt, and then enhance the information to present a full product description, image, reference information, automated categorizations, and the underlying receipt image.  Itemize is offered to consumers and small businesses through their banking and credit card relationships, whose sponsorship enables Itemize to deliver a value-added service at no cost to the end user.
